abstract: MidAmerican Energy Holdings, owned by Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, asked the Maryland Public Service Commission on Friday for approval to buy Constellation Energy and its Baltimore Gas and Electric Company, saying the deal would hold down rates increases by the utility.
lead_paragraph: MidAmerican Energy Holdings, owned by Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, asked the Maryland Public Service Commission on Friday for approval to buy Constellation Energy and its Baltimore Gas and Electric Company, saying the deal would hold down rates increases by the utility.

headline.main: MidAmerican Moves Ahead on Constellation Deal
